TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateEditingVerb extends System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class TemplateEditingVerb Inherits DesignerVerb Implements IDisposable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because template editing is handled in ControlDesigner. To support template editing expose template data in the TemplateGroups property and call SetViewFlags(ViewFlags.TemplateEditing, true). http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 表示會建立樣板 (Template) 編輯框架的設計工具動詞命令，且只可由樣板編輯器叫用 (Invoke)。

span.span: Represents a designer verb that creates a template editing frame, and that can be invoked only by a template editor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別已經過時。The class is obsolete. 公開透過範本控制項設計工具的屬性。Expose templates through the property of a control designer. 設計主應用程式建立每個針對控制項設計工具定義。The design host creates a for each defined for a control designer.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的執行個體。

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫允許所使用的資源都重新配置用於其他用途。Calling allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. > [!NOTE] > 類別已經過時。The class is obsolete. 公開透過範本控制項設計工具的屬性。Expose templates through the property of a control designer. 設計主應用程式建立每個針對控制項設計工具定義。The design host creates a for each defined for a control designer.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);

Member.Docs: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。 to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources. 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources. ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`設`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with `disposing` set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When `disposing` is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object. 類別已經過時。The class is obsolete. 公開透過範本控制項設計工具的屬性。Expose templates through the property of a control designer. 設計主應用程式建立每個針對控制項設計工具定義。The design host creates a for each defined for a control designer. 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。 can be called multiple times by other objects. 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed
Finalize ()
!TemplateEditingVerb ()

summary.span: 在記憶體回收收回物件前，嘗試釋放資源。

span.span: Attempts to free resources before the object is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫並清除資源，藉由呼叫`Dispose(false)`。This method overrides and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`. 覆寫 `Dispose(Boolean)` 以自訂清除。Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup. 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Finalize 方法和解構函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3). > [!NOTE] > 類別已經過時。The class is obsolete. 公開透過範本控制項設計工具的屬性。Expose templates through the property of a control designer. 設計主應用程式建立每個針對控制項設計工具定義。The design host creates a for each defined for a control designer.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Index { get; }
.property instance int32 Index
Public ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: property int Index { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得動詞命令的索引或其他使用者資料。

span.span: Gets the index or other user data for the verb.

value.span: 動詞命令的索引或使用者資料。

span.span: The index or user data for the verb.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性，有時候會儲存每一個指令動詞索引的指令動詞的集合中。This property is sometimes used to store the index of each verb in a set of verbs. 在實作自訂的設計工具時，這個屬性可用來儲存自訂的整數資料。When implementing a custom designer, this property can be used to store custom-defined integer data. > [!NOTE] > 類別已經過時。The class is obsolete. 公開透過範本控制項設計工具的屬性。Expose templates through the property of a control designer. 設計主應用程式建立每個針對控制項設計工具定義。The design host creates a for each defined for a control designer.
